# MPShuffleType.off

**Case**

Nothing is shuffled during playback.

## Declaration

```swift
case off
```

## Shuffle types

- **MPShuffleType.items**: Individual items are shuffled during playback.
- **MPShuffleType.collections**: Collections of items are shuffled during playback.

items.description: Individual items are shuffled during playback.
items.name: MPShuffleType.items

items.description: Collections of items are shuffled during playback.
items.name: MPShuffleType.collections

title: MPShuffleType.off
